sentences.english: A red carpet stretched across the cement floor, welcomingvisitors to a huge door that appeared to be forged of solid metal.
sentences.chinese: 水泥地上的红地毯一直延伸到一扇厚厚的金属大门前。

sentences.english: Upslope fog is usually dense, and extends to high altitudes.
sentences.chinese: 上坡雾通常是密集，并延伸到高海拔地区。

sentences.english: White on the feet is desired but must not extend higher than the pasterns.
sentences.chinese: 白色足爪比较理想，但白色不能延伸到脚腕。

sentences.english: The initiation toughness has a linear relationship with stretch zone width in the weldment.
sentences.chinese: 裂纹尖端的延伸区宽度和起裂韧性具有良好的关系。

sentences.english: All of phenomenology can be regarded as an unfolding of the idea of intentionality .
sentences.chinese: 所有的现象学都可以看作是意向性思想的延伸。

sentences.english: Another will run two miles from Elephant and Castle in the south to Farringdon in north London.
sentences.chinese: 另一条从南边的象堡到北伦敦的法灵顿，延伸两英里。

sentences.english: It extends posteriorly between the orbits and otic capsules to the foramen magnum.
sentences.chinese: 它在眼窝与耳囊到枕骨大孔之间向后延伸。

sentences.english: It's actually an elongated nose and upper lip.
sentences.chinese: 这实际上是鼻子和上唇的延伸。

sentences.english: We should focus on rural radio and television coverage by the extension to the family.
sentences.chinese: 要着力推进农村广播电视由村村通向户户通延伸。

sentences.english: The window looked down on the gravel road stretching south.
sentences.chinese: 窗外，一条碎石路向南延伸。

sentences.english: The case middle is harmoniously extended by the lugs.
sentences.chinese: 表壳中段凸耳销和谐的延伸出来。

sentences.english: Parallel flow through two extended length elements mounted end to end.
sentences.chinese: 通过两个平行延伸长度要素流动式端到端的。

sentences.english: Majoring in yellow wine, the group is actively developing its relevant extended products.
sentences.chinese: 集团公司以黄酒为主业，积极发展黄酒相关延伸产品。

sentences.english: Aftershocks extended along the fault system in both directions.
sentences.chinese: 余震沿着断层系统向两个方向延伸。

sentences.english: The stone stairs stretches to the entrance of Liang Garden.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒曲折的石梯一直延伸至良庄入口处。

sentences.english: The makers of navigation devices have not ignored the spread of smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 导航设备制造商们并没有忽略向智能手机的延伸。

definition: to run through/a connecting thread from beginning to end/to link
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
depth (from front to rear)/depth (into a territory)/span (of time)/(fig.) depth (of deployment, progress, development etc)
to open access/to establish contact/to remove a block/to put through (a phone connection)
